Welcome to Piggies in a Pen Game

We hope you will fully enjoy our simple and fun game!

 The game is designed with multiple features including the ability to switch between Single Player and Multiplayer with one button. You can press the toggle button to do that action.

For more information on the different features of our app, please refer to our help menu.

The game is set in a pre defined grid chosen by the player. Each player in the games takes a turn into placing a fence between two adjacents points , If a point is made (by closing a fence), the current player gets another turn. The game ends when all there is no more fences left to place on the grid.
The player is given an option to play with another player/friend or against a computer. In both game modes, the same rules are applied.

This game comes with several features. First, you are given the opportunity to play with a friend through the Single Player and Multi Player option. To do so, simply press the Tuggle Button on the top right corner of the screen.

Upon press, you will be directed into a new game where you can interact either with the AI or your friend. In this game, you also get a chance to switch between multiple grids. 

Indeed, within our game, you are given the chance to play within a 5x5, 6x6 and a 7x7 grid. Finally, our game has been build around a farm theme. This means that we have designed our user experience to reflect that theme! You will hear sounds, see pigs and fences reflecting that theme.
